channel.title: Teams Spreadsheet
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Teams Spreadsheet"

item.title: Re: Teams Spreadsheet
item.content:encoded: Thanks Tiki! I'm going to pour over this one later, it looks interesting!

item.title: Teams Spreadsheet
item.content:encoded: I just uploaded the first version of my team bonuses spreadsheet. Right now it is still incomplete as it only has the stat bonuses, and not other unrelated ones. On this plus side this can be quite useful for people who want to maximize a certain stat or set of stats as they can just sort by whatever they want. Check the Teams page attachments for the file.
